languages.text: "Мне хотелось поговорить как обычные люди. Для человека моего статуса это редкое удовольствие".

traits.locale_text: "Мне хотелось поговорить как обычные люди. Для человека моего статуса это редкое удовольствие".

languages.text: "I wanted to talk like normal people do. For a {mf|man|woman} of my status, it's a rare treat."
languages.original_text: "Мне хотелось поговорить как обычные люди. Для человека моего статуса это редкое удовольствие".

traits.locale_text: "I wanted to talk like normal people do. For a {mf|man|woman} of my status, it's a rare treat."
"I wanted to talk like normal people do. For a {mf|man|woman} of my status, it's a rare treat."
"I wanted to talk like normal people do. For a {mf|man|woman} of my status, it's a rare treat."
"I wanted to talk like normal people do. For a {mf|man|woman} of my status, it's a rare treat."
"I wanted to talk like normal people do. For a {mf|man|woman} of my status, it's a rare treat."

languages.text: “我只想像正常人那样说话。对于我这种身份的人而言，这可是相当难得的待遇。”
languages.original_text: "I wanted to talk like normal people do. For a {mf|man|woman} of my status, it's a rare treat."

traits.locale_text: “我只想像正常人那样说话。对于我这种身份的人而言，这可是相当难得的待遇。”

languages.text: «Quería hablar como la gente normal. Para {mf|un|una} {mf|hombre|mujer} de mi estatus, las oportunidades de hacerlo escasean».
languages.original_text: "I wanted to talk like normal people do. For a {mf|man|woman} of my status, it's a rare treat."

traits.locale_text: «Quería hablar como la gente normal. Para {mf|un|una} {mf|hombre|mujer} de mi estatus, las oportunidades de hacerlo escasean».

languages.text: 「普通の人間と同じように話したかった。私のような立場の{mf|男|女}には滅多にないことだからな」
languages.original_text: "I wanted to talk like normal people do. For a {mf|man|woman} of my status, it's a rare treat."

traits.locale_text: 「普通の人間と同じように話したかった。私のような立場の{mf|男|女}には滅多にないことだからな」

languages.text: "Ich wollte ein Gespräch unter normalen Menschen. {mf|Männer|Frauen} meines Status haben das nur selten."
languages.original_text: "I wanted to talk like normal people do. For a {mf|man|woman} of my status, it's a rare treat."

traits.locale_text: "Ich wollte ein Gespräch unter normalen Menschen. {mf|Männer|Frauen} meines Status haben das nur selten."

languages.text: « Je voulais avoir une conversation ordinaire. Pour {mf|un homme|une femme} de mon rang, c'est un plaisir rare. »
languages.original_text: "I wanted to talk like normal people do. For a {mf|man|woman} of my status, it's a rare treat."

traits.locale_text: « Je voulais avoir une conversation ordinaire. Pour {mf|un homme|une femme} de mon rang, c'est un plaisir rare. »

languages.text: "Normal insanlar gibi konuşmak istedim. Benim mevkimde bir {mf|adam|kadın}, bu zevke sık varamıyor."
languages.original_text: "I wanted to talk like normal people do. For a {mf|man|woman} of my status, it's a rare treat."

traits.locale_text: "Normal insanlar gibi konuşmak istedim. Benim mevkimde bir {mf|adam|kadın} bu zevke sık varamıyor."
